Landing.description: Build a consistent and responsive front-end for your business.

About.aboutMe1: My name is Bernardo Fonseca, and I am a skilled developer based in Natal , RN, Brazil. I specialize in crafting cutting-edge mobile and web applications using React.js and React Native. Additionally, I bring expertise in backend development through Node.js and Express.
About.aboutMe2: I am enthusiastic about the prospect of contributing to the the success of your project. Whether you have a clear project roadmap or are in the initial planning stages, I am ready to bring my skills to the table.
About.degree1: Graduated in chemistry Engineering at Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte
About.degree2: Master Science in Oil Science & Engineering at Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte
About.experience1: Full-Stack developer at Centro de Inovação Edge
About.experience2: Web and mobile developer at Extraconomy company
About.experience3: Front-end developer at Laboratório de Automação em Petróleo (LAUT)

Portfolio.title: Portfolio
Portfolio.mywebpageDescription: Welcome to my professional web page! Explore my portfolio, discover my skills, and get in touch.
Portfolio.eqbeaDescription: Mobile application for animal welfare management and diagnosis prediction.
Portfolio.flowersDescription: This web application is a dashboard to flower stock control.
Portfolio.nerdflixDescription: Nerdflix is an web app that simulates an online movie store. You can browse a movie and add to your cart.
Portfolio.walletDescription: One of my first projects. It is a digital wallet that calculates and converts any expense in any currency into reais.
Portfolio.hashgameDescription: My first React project: a tic-tac-toe game where you can challenge yourself by playing against the computer. Enjoy the challenge!
